artists.biography: Leonardo da Vinci was an Italian polymath of the Renaissance whose areas of interest included invention, painting, sculpting, architecture, science, music, mathematics, engineering, literature, anatomy, geology, astronomy, botany, writing, history, and cartography.

artworks.title: Mona Lisa
artworks.description: A portrait of a woman with an enigmatic expression.

artworks.title: The Last Supper
artworks.description: A mural painting representing the scene of The Last Supper of Jesus with his apostles.

artworks.title: Vitruvian Man
artworks.description: A drawing depicting the ideal human body proportions.

artworks.title: Lady with an Ermine
artworks.description: A portrait of Cecilia Gallerani holding an ermine.

artists.biography: Vincent van Gogh was a Dutch post-impressionist painter who is among the most famous and influential figures in Western art. He created about 2,100 artworks, including about 860 oil paintings, most of them in the last two years of his life.

artworks.title: Starry Night
artworks.description: A depiction of a swirling night sky over a quiet town.

artworks.title: Sunflowers
artworks.description: A series of paintings depicting sunflowers in a vase.

artworks.title: The Bedroom
artworks.description: A painting of Van Gogh's bedroom in Arles.

artworks.title: Irises
artworks.description: A vibrant painting of irises.

artists.biography: Pablo Picasso was a Spanish painter, sculptor, printmaker, ceramicist and theatre designer who spent most of his adult life in France. He is known for co-founding the Cubist movement, the invention of constructed sculpture, and the co-invention of collage.

artworks.title: Les Demoiselles d'Avignon
artworks.description: A large oil painting depicting five nude female prostitutes from a brothel on Carrer d'Avinyó in Barcelona.

artworks.title: Guernica
artworks.description: A mural-sized oil painting on canvas representing the bombing of Guernica during the Spanish Civil War.

artworks.title: The Weeping Woman
artworks.description: A series of paintings depicting a woman crying.

artworks.title: Girl before a Mirror
artworks.description: A painting that explores the complex nature of identity and self-perception.

artists.biography: Claude Monet was a French painter, a founder of French Impressionist painting, and the most consistent and prolific practitioner of the movement's philosophy of expressing one's perceptions before nature.

artworks.title: Impression, Sunrise
artworks.description: A painting depicting the port of Le Havre at sunrise.

artworks.title: Water Lilies
artworks.description: A series of approximately 250 oil paintings depicting Monet's flower garden at Giverny.

artworks.title: Woman with a Parasol
artworks.description: A painting of Monet's wife and son on a windy summer's day.

artworks.title: Rouen Cathedral Series
artworks.description: A series of paintings depicting the facade of Rouen Cathedral at different times of day and in various weather conditions.

artists.biography: Michelangelo was an Italian sculptor, painter, architect and poet of the High Renaissance born in the Republic of Florence. He exerted an unparalleled influence on the development of Western art.

artworks.title: David
artworks.description: A marble statue representing the biblical hero David.

artworks.title: Sistine Chapel Ceiling
artworks.description: A series of frescoes covering the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel.

artworks.title: Pietà
artworks.description: A marble sculpture of the Virgin Mary holding the dead body of Jesus.

artworks.title: The Last Judgment
artworks.description: A fresco covering the entire altar wall of the Sistine Chapel.

artists.biography: Rembrandt was a Dutch Golden Age painter, printmaker, and draughtsman. An innovative and prolific master in three media, he is generally considered one of the greatest visual artists in the history of art and the most important in Dutch art history.

artworks.title: The Night Watch
artworks.description: A painting depicting a city guard moving out, led by Captain Frans Banning Cocq and his lieutenant, Willem van Ruytenburch.

artworks.title: The Anatomy Lesson of Dr. Nicolaes Tulp
artworks.description: A group portrait showing Dr. Tulp explaining the musculature of the arm to other doctors.

artworks.title: The Jewish Bride
artworks.description: A painting depicting a couple with solemn and introspective expressions.

artworks.title: Self-Portrait with Two Circles
artworks.description: A self-portrait of Rembrandt holding his palette and brushes.

artists.biography: Johannes Vermeer was a Dutch Baroque painter who specialized in domestic interior scenes of middle-class life. He is particularly renowned for his masterly treatment and use of light in his work.

artworks.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
artworks.description: A painting of a girl wearing an exotic dress, an oriental turban, and a large pearl earring.

artworks.title: The Milkmaid
artworks.description: A painting depicting a domestic kitchen maid pouring milk.

artworks.title: The Art of Painting
artworks.description: A painting showing an artist painting a woman posing as a model in the artist's studio.

artworks.title: View of Delft
artworks.description: A cityscape of Vermeer's hometown of Delft.

artists.biography: Salvador Dalí was a Spanish surrealist artist renowned for his technical skill, precise draftsmanship, and the striking and bizarre images in his work.

artworks.title: The Persistence of Memory
artworks.description: A painting known for its melting clocks in a desert landscape.

artworks.title: The Elephants
artworks.description: A painting featuring elephants with long, spindly legs.

artworks.title: Swans Reflecting Elephants
artworks.description: A painting using the double-image technique.

artworks.title: The Sacrament of the Last Supper
artworks.description: A surrealistic depiction of the Last Supper of Jesus.

artists.biography: Henri Matisse was a French visual artist, known for both his use of color and his fluid and original draughtsmanship. He was a draughtsman, printmaker, and sculptor, but is known primarily as a painter.

artworks.title: The Dance
artworks.description: A painting depicting five dancing figures.

artworks.title: The Snail
artworks.description: A large-scale collage made from paper cut-outs.

artworks.title: Woman with a Hat
artworks.description: A painting of Matisse's wife, Amélie.

artworks.title: Blue Nudes
artworks.description: A series of paintings depicting nude female figures.

artists.biography: Edvard Munch was a Norwegian painter. His best known work, The Scream, has become one of the iconic images of world art.

artworks.title: The Scream
artworks.description: A painting depicting a figure with an agonized expression against a tumultuous orange sky.

artworks.title: Madonna
artworks.description: A painting of a woman with long flowing hair.

artworks.title: The Dance of Life
artworks.description: A painting that represents the stages of a woman's life.

artworks.title: The Sick Child
artworks.description: A painting depicting a child lying in bed while her mother looks on.

artists.biography: Jackson Pollock was an American painter and a major figure in the abstract expressionist movement. He was widely noticed for his 'drip technique' of pouring or splashing liquid household paint onto a horizontal surface.

artworks.title: No. 5, 1948
artworks.description: A painting with dense, chaotic swirls of paint.

artworks.title: Autumn Rhythm (Number 30)
artworks.description: A painting with swirling layers of black, white, and brown paint.

artworks.title: Convergence
artworks.description: A painting known for its complexity and vivid colors.

artworks.title: Blue Poles
artworks.description: A painting featuring several bold blue lines against a chaotic background.

artists.biography: Frida Kahlo was a Mexican painter known for her many portraits, self-portraits, and works inspired by the nature and artifacts of Mexico. She employed a naïve folk art style to explore questions of identity, postcolonialism, gender, class, and race in Mexican society.

artworks.title: The Two Fridas
artworks.description: A painting depicting two versions of Kahlo seated side by side.

artworks.title: Self-Portrait with Thorn Necklace and Hummingbird
artworks.description: A self-portrait of Kahlo with a thorn necklace and a hummingbird.

artworks.title: The Broken Column
artworks.description: A self-portrait of Kahlo with a broken column replacing her spine.

artworks.title: Viva la Vida
artworks.description: A still life painting of watermelons.

artists.biography: Georgia O'Keeffe was an American modernist artist. She was known for her paintings of enlarged flowers, New York skyscrapers, and New Mexico landscapes.

artworks.title: Jimson Weed
artworks.description: A painting of a white flower.

artworks.title: Black Iris
artworks.description: A painting of a black iris flower.

artworks.title: Radiator Building - Night, New York
artworks.description: A painting depicting the Radiator Building in New York City.

artworks.title: Sky Above Clouds IV
artworks.description: A painting depicting clouds seen from above.

artists.biography: Andy Warhol was an American artist, film director, and producer who was a leading figure in the visual art movement known as pop art.

artworks.title: Marilyn Diptych
artworks.description: A silkscreen painting depicting fifty images of Marilyn Monroe.

artworks.title: Campbell's Soup Cans
artworks.description: A series of paintings depicting various Campbell's soup cans.

artworks.title: Eight Elvises
artworks.description: A painting depicting eight identical, overlapping images of Elvis Presley.

artworks.title: Silver Car Crash (Double Disaster)
artworks.description: A painting depicting the aftermath of a car crash.

artists.biography: Wassily Kandinsky was a Russian painter and art theorist. He is generally credited as the pioneer of abstract art.

artworks.title: Composition VIII
artworks.description: A painting featuring geometric shapes and vibrant colors.

artworks.title: Yellow-Red-Blue
artworks.description: A painting with bold colors and geometric shapes.

artworks.title: Composition VII
artworks.description: A painting known for its swirling and chaotic composition.

artworks.title: On White II
artworks.description: A painting with abstract shapes and bold colors on a white background.
